channel.title: Coffee Breakz
channel.description: This is a highly caffeinated radio broadcast for your listening pleasure. Have an espresso, a cappuccino or just black coffee. But please don't sleep! Updated every Saturday.
channel.itunes:author: Helder Gomes

item.title: #8: Melhores de 2006
item.description: Tracks from Carlos Bica & Azul, Romica Puceanu & the Gore Brothers, Dabrye (feat Jay Dee and Phat Kat), Sei Miguel, Sunn 0))) & Boris, Lisa Germano, Mouse on Mars, No Luck Club, Burial, and Chuck E. Weiss.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Carlos Bica & Azul, Romica Puceanu & the Gore Brothers, Dabrye (feat Jay Dee and Phat Kat), Sei Miguel, Sunn 0))) & Boris, Lisa Germano, Mouse on Mars, No Luck Club, Burial, and Chuck E. Weiss.

item.title: #7: Especial Natal
item.description: Tracks from Mogwai, Low, Butthole Surfers, Bright Eyes, Sonic Youth, Grandaddy, Gomo, Themselves, The Murder City Devils, William S. Burroughs/Kurt Cobain, and Beirut.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Mogwai, Low, Butthole Surfers, Bright Eyes, Sonic Youth, Grandaddy, Gomo, Themselves, The Murder City Devils, William S. Burroughs/Kurt Cobain, and Beirut.

item.title: #6: Choubi! Choubi! O Iraque da pop à folk
item.description: Tracks from Ja'afar Hassan, Bawin, Sajada Al Ubaid, Mohammed Al Madloul, Sadun Jabir, Salah Abd Alghafour, Souad Abdullah, and others.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Ja'afar Hassan, Bawin, Sajada Al Ubaid, Mohammed Al Madloul, Sadun Jabir, Salah Abd Alghafour, Souad Abdullah, and others.

item.title: #5: The Downtempo Sessions
item.description: Tracks from Underwolves, Towa Tei feat. Bebel Gilberto, Boom Boom Satellites, Sneaker Pimps, FC Kahuna, Crustation, The Glove, UNKLE feat. Thom Yorke, Bonobo, Buscemi, and Aromabar.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Underwolves, Towa Tei feat. Bebel Gilberto, Boom Boom Satellites, Sneaker Pimps, FC Kahuna, Crustation, The Glove, UNKLE feat. Thom Yorke, Bonobo, Buscemi, and Aromabar.

item.title: #4: Anita O'Day (1919-2006)
item.description: Tracks from Anita O'Day, Ella Fitzgerald, Billie Holiday, Abbey Lincoln, Peggy Lee, Patricia Barber, Helen Merrill, June Christy, Betty Carter, Carmen McRae + Betty Carter, Blossom Dearie, Dinah Washington, Sheila Jordan, Shirley Horn, and Cat Power.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Anita O'Day, Ella Fitzgerald, Billie Holiday, Abbey Lincoln, Peggy Lee, Patricia Barber, Helen Merrill, June Christy, Betty Carter, Carmen McRae + Betty Carter, Blossom Dearie, Dinah Washington, Sheila Jordan, Shirley Horn, and Cat Power.

item.title: #3: Vozes da rua
item.description: Tracks from Absinthe, Heat Sensor, Dabrye (feat Jay Dee & Phat Kat), edIT, Ambulance Chasers, Kitimat, Andrew Thompson, Superdense Child, DJ Flack, Teledubgnosis, Baby Blak, and Fluorescent Grey.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Absinthe, Heat Sensor, Dabrye (feat Jay Dee & Phat Kat), edIT, Ambulance Chasers, Kitimat, Andrew Thompson, Superdense Child, DJ Flack, Teledubgnosis, Baby Blak, and Fluorescent Grey.

item.title: #2 (10): The (Unsigned) Hip Hop Sessions
item.description: Tracks from Juggla, Trife Salasi, Zeez, Vangaurd, Reef The Lost Cauze, French & Graph, Tame One & DJ Porno, Kustoo, Omega, Fenalm, DJ Crumbumb, Bashton & Megalon, Jak Progresso, TDI, Conumdrum One, The Kid, and Dump Sites.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Juggla, Trife Salasi, Zeez, Vangaurd, Reef The Lost Cauze, French & Graph, Tame One & DJ Porno, Kustoo, Omega, Fenalm, DJ Crumbumb, Bashton & Megalon, Jak Progresso, TDI, Conumdrum One, The Kid, and Dump Sites.

item.title: #1 (9): Atlantic Waves 2006
item.description: This week, Coffee Breakz highlights the sixth edition of Atlantic Waves - Exploratory Music from Portugal and Beyond, which takes place in London from the 2nd to the 30th of November. Tracks from Shlomo, Carlos Bica, Mieyon & Park Je Chun, Max Eastley, Z'EV, Robert Rutman, Victor Gama, Asmus Tietchens, Thomas Köner, Paulo Raposo, and David Maranha. Enjoy!
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: This week, Coffee Breakz highlights the sixth edition of Atlantic Waves - Exploratory Music from Portugal and Beyond, which takes place in London from the 2nd to the 30th of November. Tracks from Shlomo, Carlos Bica, Mieyon & Park Je Chun, Max Eastley, Z'EV, Robert Rutman, Victor Gama, Asmus Tietchens, Thomas Köner, Paulo Raposo, and David Maranha. Enjoy!

item.title: #8: "With a humble heart, on bended knee"
item.description: Tracks from Glaxo Babies, ESG, Aloe Blacc, Sufjan Stevens, Thom Yorke, Amen Andrews, Kerrier District, Tim Maia, Sachiko Kanenobu, James Figurine, Billy Nicholls, Labi Siffre, Linda Lewis, Cymande, Monoton, The North Sea & Rameses III, Johnny Cash, Ram, Jo-Jo & the Fugitives, Jezzreel, Alva Noto, Oneida, Plaid & Bob Jaroc, Rotary Connection, and Milton Nascimento.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Glaxo Babies, ESG, Aloe Blacc, Sufjan Stevens, Thom Yorke, Amen Andrews, Kerrier District, Tim Maia, Sachiko Kanenobu, James Figurine, Billy Nicholls, Labi Siffre, Linda Lewis, Cymande, Monoton, The North Sea & Rameses III, Johnny Cash, Ram, Jo-Jo & the Fugitives, Jezzreel, Alva Noto, Oneida, Plaid & Bob Jaroc, Rotary Connection, and Milton Nascimento.

item.title: #7: "Salvation comes for free"
item.description: Tracks from Four Tet, Roc 'C', Dirty On Purpose, Big Youth, Tunji Oyelana, Ambrose Cambell, Isan, Henrik Schwarz, Dixon & Ame, Carsten Jost, Chris Smither, Yazoo, Deee-Lite feat. Osca Child, Dr. Octagon, Flying, Silverhead, Fingletoad, Strange & Siho, Keene Brothers, The Takeovers, Psycho & The Birds, Bruno Spoerri, Matthew Dear as Audion, Les Rallizes Denudes, Takashi Nishioka, and Os Mutantes.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Four Tet, Roc 'C', Dirty On Purpose, Big Youth, Tunji Oyelana, Ambrose Cambell, Isan, Henrik Schwarz, Dixon & Ame, Carsten Jost, Chris Smither, Yazoo, Deee-Lite feat. Osca Child, Dr. Octagon, Flying, Silverhead, Fingletoad, Strange & Siho, Keene Brothers, The Takeovers, Psycho & The Birds, Bruno Spoerri, Matthew Dear as Audion, Les Rallizes Denudes, Takashi Nishioka, and Os Mutantes.

item.title: #6: The World Tapes
item.description: These world tapes include Charivari, Tom Zé, Cesária Évora, Manu Chao, Gotan Project, Warsaw Village Band, Hurdy Gurdy, Baaba Maal, Thione Seck, Yat-Kha, and Edil Husainov.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: These world tapes include Charivari, Tom Zé, Cesária Évora, Manu Chao, Gotan Project, Warsaw Village Band, Hurdy Gurdy, Baaba Maal, Thione Seck, Yat-Kha, and Edil Husainov.

item.title: #5: Coffee Breakz on the road
item.description: Tracks from Joy Division, My Bloody Valentine, The Go! Team, Air, Bango, Bonnie 'Prince' Billy, Stephen Malkmus, Pixies, Yo La Tengo, Built to Spill, Spoon, Animal Collective, Triumph of Lethargy Skinned Alive to Death, and Sonic Youth. Enjoy!
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Joy Division, My Bloody Valentine, The Go! Team, Air, Bango, Bonnie 'Prince' Billy, Stephen Malkmus, Pixies, Yo La Tengo, Built to Spill, Spoon, Animal Collective, Triumph of Lethargy Skinned Alive to Death, and Sonic Youth. Enjoy!

item.title: #4: The Hip-Hop Sessions - Part I
item.description: Includes tracks from Company Flow, A Tribe Called Quest, Lootpack, M.I.A., Viktor Vaughn, Non-Prophets, Sixtoo, Dr. Octagon, DJ Shadow, Madlib, Prefuse 73, Aceyalone, De La Soul, El-P, and Wu-Tang Clan.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Includes tracks from Company Flow, A Tribe Called Quest, Lootpack, M.I.A., Viktor Vaughn, Non-Prophets, Sixtoo, Dr. Octagon, DJ Shadow, Madlib, Prefuse 73, Aceyalone, De La Soul, El-P, and Wu-Tang Clan.

item.title: #3: "Vous avez lu l'histoire de Jesse James"
item.description: Tracks from Gerry Mitchell & Little Sparta, Hans Fjellestad, Matt Elliott, Vert, This Heat, Moha, aMute, Prefuse 73 versus Pedro, Aesop Quartet, and Serge Gainsbourg.
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: Tracks from Gerry Mitchell & Little Sparta, Hans Fjellestad, Matt Elliott, Vert, This Heat, Moha, aMute, Prefuse 73 versus Pedro, Aesop Quartet, and Serge Gainsbourg.

item.title: #2: Ali Farka Touré (1939-2006)
item.description: A tribute to "the African John Lee Hooker".
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: A tribute to "the African John Lee Hooker".

item.title: #1: "Stars of night turned deep to dust"
item.description: This first show in Coffee Break's second season includes tracks from David Byrne, Sei Miguel, Cat Power, Pajo, Fovea Hex, Oren Marshall, Efterklang, Merz, Buck 65, Charivari, Neu!, and DJ Nuts (remixed by Coffee Breakz).
item.itunes:author: Helder Gomes
item.itunes:summary: This first show in Coffee Break's second season includes tracks from David Byrne, Sei Miguel, Cat Power, Pajo, Fovea Hex, Oren Marshall, Efterklang, Merz, Buck 65, Charivari, Neu!, and DJ Nuts (remixed by Coffee Breakz).
